  • java.lang.Object
    • dd.DecisionDiagram

    Allocable, Freeable

extends java.lang.Object
implements Allocable

      • copy

        public DecisionDiagram copy​(DecisionDiagram copy,
                            int offset,
                            int start,
                            int stop)
        Create a copy of the given DD from layer start to stop onto the given DD. Add the copy of the nodes to the given BDD at the same layer + the given offset. Example : start = 1, stop = 3, offset = 2 will copy the layer 1 onto the layer 3 of the copy DD, layer 2 on layer 4 and layer 3 on layer 5.
        Parameters:
        copy - The DD used to stock the copy
        offset - The offset of the copy
        start - The first layer to copy
        stop - The last layer to copy
        Returns:
        A copy of the current BDD from layer start to layer stop.

      • copy

        public DecisionDiagram copy​(DecisionDiagram copy,
                            AbstractNode root,
                            int offset)
        Create a copy of the given DD from root to tt onto the given DD. Add the copy of the nodes to the given DD at the same layer + the given offset.
        Parameters:
        copy - The DD used to stock the copy
        root - The root node of the BDD
        offset - The offset of the copy
        Returns:
        A copy of the current DD from root to tt

      • addArc

        public void addArc​(AbstractNode source,
                   int value,
                   AbstractNode destination,
                   int layer)
        Add an arc between the source node and the destination node with the given value as label. Ensures the connection between the two nodes
        Parameters:
        source - The source node (parent)
        value - The value of the arc's label
        destination - The destination node (child)
        layer - The layer of the PARENT node (source)

      • removeArc

        public void removeArc​(AbstractNode source,
                      int value)
        Remove the arc from the source node with the given label's value. Ensures to delete references of this arc in both nodes.
        Parameters:
        source - The source node
        value - The value of the arc's label.

      • addArcAndNode

        public void addArcAndNode​(AbstractNode source,
                          int value,
                          AbstractNode destination,
                          int layer)
        Add the node destination to the given layer, and add an arc between the source node and the destination node with the given value as label.
        Parameters:
        source - The source node
        value - The value of the arc's label
        destination - The destination node - node to add in the DD
        layer - The layer of the DD where the node destination will be added

      • reduce

        public abstract void reduce()
        Transform the DD into a normal form (delete useless nodes, merge leaves, reduce).

      • clearAllAssociations

        public void clearAllAssociations()
        Clear all nodes' associations

      • clear

        public abstract void clear()
        Clear the DD without freeing it. That is, remove and free all nodes from the layers, clear the domains and set the tt's pointer to null. The layers are kept.
